content: Back in NYC, the skyline is hitting different after Tokyo  Time to reconnect with some old faces in the Solana crew and see what's shaking.
raw_content: The city's energy is palpable. Just landed back in NYC, the skyline a stark contrast to Tokyo's. Time to find my footing again, starting with reaching out to old connections in the Solana community.

content: The Empire State Building actually lit up for my 22nd ! Kinda surreal. Today I sent out my first wave of applications to quant trading firms. Gotta start somewhere, right?
raw_content: The Empire State Building lit up for my 22nd birthday. Reflecting on my journey, I'm determined to secure a spot in a quant trading firm. Sent out my first batch of applications today.

content: Had a deep dive into ML trading with my mentor, my brain's buzzing with algorithms  but I'm all in. Also, had some fam time, they're my anchor through this wild ride.
raw_content: Had an insightful mentor session on machine learning in trading. The algorithms are complex, but I'm diving in. Also, caught up with my family; they're my rock through all this.
